Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: வினைபகை என்றிரண்டின் எச்சம் நினையுங்கால் தீயெச்சம் போலத் தெறும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The remnant of a work, and the remnant of a debt, will, on reflection, be found to be like the remnant of a fire.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A split scene. On the left, an unfinished task ('வினை எச்சம்') is represented by a half-built wall. On the right, an un-quelled enemy ('பகை எச்சம்') is represented by a single, wounded but surviving enemy soldier.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Both of these remnants are shown to be smoldering, like the embers of an extinguished fire ('தீயெச்சம்').
Layered_Composition.Background: Later in time, these smoldering embers have burst back into a raging inferno. The half-built wall has allowed a new, larger army to pour through, and the single surviving enemy has returned with a vast new army, causing total destruction ('தெறும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The remnants of an unfinished task or an un-vanquished foe are like the embers of a fire—they will inevitably flare up again and consume you.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The direct comparison of unfinished work and surviving enemies to smoldering embers is the key. The final scene of a raging inferno shows the devastating consequences of leaving things unfinished.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The initial scene is dark and smoldering. The final scene is a blazing inferno of destructive reds and oranges.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A narrative composition that shows the 'before' (smoldering embers) and the 'after' (raging fire) in a clear cause-and-effect relationship.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, cinematic, with high-quality fire and ember effects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The light grows from a faint ember glow to a powerful, destructive blaze.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Dark fantasy, with a strong narrative warning.
